scripts.start: eslint index.js src/**/**.js test/**/**.js && node --harmony index.js
scripts.setup: cp configuration.example.js configuration.js && npm install && npm install -g mocha eslint && npm run client:install
scripts.client:install: git clone https://github.com/CovenantCollege/ChoirMasterClient.git client && cd client && npm install && npm install -g create-react-app && npm install -g react-scripts && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.client:update: cd client && git pull && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
